mapper.insert:
insert into rawIssue ( uuid, type, tool, detail, file_name, scan_id, issue_id, commit_id, developer, repo_id, code_lines, status ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.type}, #{item.tool}, #{item.detail}, #{item.file_name}, #{item.scan_id}, #{item.issue_id}, #{item.commit_id}, #{item.developerName}, #{item.repo_id}, #{item.code_lines}, #{item.status} )
mapper.select: select uuid,type,tool,detail,file_name,scan_id,issue_id,commit_id,repo_id,code_lines,status from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and tool = #{tool} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and status != 'solved' and status != 'merge solved'

select distinct a.uuid, a.type, a.tool, a.detail, a.file_name as fileName,a.scan_id as scanId, a.issue_id as issueUuid, a.commit_id as commitId,a.repo_id as repoUuid, a.code_lines as codeLines,a.status,b.commit_time as commitTime, b.developer_email as developerEmail from rawIssue as a inner join commit as b on a.commit_id = b.commit_id where a.issue_id=#{issueId} and status != "default" order by commit_time desc ;
select count(*) from rawIssue where issue_id = #{issueId};

SELECT DISTINCT b.developer_unique_name FROM rawIssue as a INNER JOIN commit_view as b ON a.repo_id = b.repo_id AND a.commit_id = b.commit_id
a.`status` = "add" AND a.issue_id = #{issue_id}
